changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT count(1) FROM projectprop pp, cvtermprop c, project_relationship pr, project p, study_type st WHERE pp.variable_id = c.cvterm_id AND c.type_id = 1800 AND c.value = 'Nursery Condition' AND pp.project_id = pr.subject_project_id AND pr.object_project_id = p.project_id AND p.study_type_id = st.study_type_id AND st.name = 'N';

changeSet.comment: Correct the type_id of nursery condition in projectprop
changeSet.sql: UPDATE projectprop pp, cvtermprop c, project_relationship pr, project p SET pp.type_id=1803 WHERE pp.variable_id = c.cvterm_id AND c.type_id = 1800 AND c.value = 'Nursery Condition' AND pp.project_id = pr.subject_project_id AND pr.object_project_id = p.project_id AND p.study_type = 'N';

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: SELECT count(1) from projectprop pp, cvtermprop c, project_relationship pr, project p, study_type st WHERE pp.variable_id = c.cvterm_id AND c.type_id = 1800 AND c.value = 'Trial Condition' AND pp.project_id = pr.subject_project_id AND pr.object_project_id = p.project_id AND p.study_type_id = st.study_type_id AND st.name = 'T';

changeSet.comment: Correct the type_id of trial condition in projectprop
changeSet.sql: UPDATE projectprop pp, cvtermprop c, project_relationship pr, project p SET pp.type_id=1802 WHERE pp.variable_id = c.cvterm_id AND c.type_id = 1800 AND c.value = 'Trial Condition' AND pp.project_id = pr.subject_project_id AND pr.object_project_id = p.project_id AND p.study_type = 'T';
